There was a baby hawk living on a high rock. The baby hawk loved his warm nest  . And whenever the baby hawk was _ , his mother would come with delicious food. He enjoyed his life very much. But one day his world changed. His mother stopped coming to the nest. He was full of sadness and _ . He thought he would die soon. He cried, but nobody heard him.
Two days _ , his mother appeared. The baby hawk was vey joyful. But his mother put the food at the top of the rock. The baby hawk cried out. "Mum, _ did you do this to me? Don't you know I will die without anything to eat?""Here is the last meal I give you. Come and get it by yourself,"his mother said. Then she flew down and pushed the baby hawk out of the nest.
The baby hawk fell down, faster and faster . He looked up at his mum, "Why do you push me?" He looked _ at the earth. The ground was much closer. Then something strange happened. The air caught behind his arms and he began to fly! He wasn't moving to the ground any more. Instead, his eyes were pointed up at the sun.
"You are flying! You have learnt how to fly by yourself !"His mother smiled.
